pages.text: End's Delight brings new culinary creations to the mysterious End dimension. $(br2)Cook up unique recipes using Chorus Fruit, Dragon Meat, or even Roasted Shulker.
Start by crafting a Chorus Fruit Pie using chorus fruit and other ingredients. $(br2)Enjoy dishes like Ender Noodles and Shulker Soup.
Expand your cooking repertoire with dishes that will teleport your taste buds to another dimension. $(br2)End's Delight adds an otherworldly flavor to your meals!
